name: Depresso

ability.name: Caffeine Inoculation
ability.description: When activated, Depresso drinks a massive amount of energy drinks, causing its movement speed to increase.

description: It has few friends because of the perpetually grouchy look on its face, but it is in fact kindhearted. Some have seen it feeding Vixy who have strayed from their pack.

skills.name: Poison Blast
skills.description: Hurls poison sludge at an enemy.

skills.name: Sand Blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: Dark Ball
skills.description: Unleashes a sphere of darkness that slowly tracks down the enemy.

skills.name: Ice Missile
skills.description: Creates ice lances in the air that fly towards enemies.

skills.name: Shadow Burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges dark energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: Nightmare Ball
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of darkness and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: Dark Laser
skills.description: Charges dark energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
